title: For Sale or Trade: Kelley Sweet Cap PSA 2 & Griffith Batting Old Mill PSA 1
author: bundy462

posts.post_title: For Sale or Trade: Kelley Sweet Cap PSA 2 & Griffith Batting Old Mill PSA 1
posts.post_content:
1. Joe Kelley Sweet Caporal 350 factory 30, PSA 2.  Crease in upper right corner, another along the left side, but much lighter.  Back faded, typical for a PSA 2.

$70 including shipping via PayPal.  PayPal gift or money owed discounted to $65.

2. Clark Griffith Batting Old Mill factory 25, PSA 1.  Heavy creasing diagonally left upper to right lower.  Left edge roughed up.  Same with the back.  Surprisingly bright colors, the creasing is the real issue.  

$50 including shipping via PayPal.  PayPal gift or money owed discounted to $45.

* Also willing to entertain trades for either of these cards (or to buy if any lookers have ones available).  Looking for the following, must be PSA graded, willing to include cash to make the deal work.

Bill Burns
Jean Dubuc
Chick Gandil
Ed Cicotte
Hal Chase (white cap, trophy)
Any PSA 1 - 3 HOFers with backs other than Piedmont, Old Mill, Sweet Cap, Polar Bear

Please e-mail via net54 or directly to [url]jeffmbarlow@gmail.com[/url].
